data.title: Slingshot Prep
data.meta_description: Slingshot Prep has experienced tutors that can help students improve in academic classes and on standardized tests, like the ACT and SAT. Contact us for more details.
data.text:
Standardized Test Tutoring

Our tutors help students prepare for any of the following standardized tests: ISEE, SSAT, STAAR, ACT, SAT, PSAT, SAT Subject Tests, GMAT, GRE, LSAT.

Academic Tutoring

Our office has tutors experienced in all core academic subjects and in many specialized academic areas, including, but not limited to, government, religious studies, research methods, Spanish, and computer science. Our tutors have taught students at all academic levels, from elementary students to graduate students.

What's The Word?

Our Whatâs The Word? program is an intensive vocabulary course that provides students and adults with command of the English language and a competitive advantage in standardized tests. This three-week summer program helps students improve reading comprehension skills, expand vocabulary, increase school grades, raise standardized test scores, impress interviewers, and understand college professors.
